Package xxl.core.io.fat.util

Contains some utility classes for the fat implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DataManagement This interface is used to manage some kind of data.
ExtendedFileFilter A filter for pathnames.
ExtendedFilenameFilter Instances of classes that implement this interface are used to filter filenames.
 

Class Summary
ByteArrayConversionsLittleEndian Conversion routines byte-Array --> short, int, long.
InorderTraverse This class supports an inorder traversal when used with the AllEntriesIterator of class DIR.
MyMath This class supports mathematical functions.
StringOperations This class supports operations on strings.
 

Package xxl.core.io.fat.util Description

Contains some utility classes for the fat implementation.
